description: A lightweight Prometheus exporter for Technitium DNS Server exposing DNS, dashboard, zone, DHCP, and top-query metrics, with an accompanying Grafana dashboard.

panels.description: Technitium API health from exporter (1 = up, 0 = down). If this is down, other Technitium metrics may be stale or missing.
panels.title: API Status

panels.description: List of zones from Technitium with status and type. Uses Info metric labels from technitium_zone_info.
panels.title: Zone Health

panels.description: Total DNS queries in the selected Technitium stats window (e.g. LastHour).
panels.title: Total Queries (stats window)

panels.description: Share of blocked queries inside the current Technitium stats window (blocked / all).
panels.title: % Blocked (stats window)

panels.description: Share of cached answers inside the current Technitium stats window (cached / all).
panels.title: Cache Ratio (stats window)

panels.description: Number of unique DNS clients seen in the current Technitium stats window.
panels.title: Unique Clients (stats window)

panels.description: Active DHCP leases per scope, split by lease type (Dynamic / Reserved / etc) from Technitium DHCP API.
panels.title: DHCP Scopes (Active Leases)

panels.description: Most-blocked domains in the selected stats window (hits per blocked domain).
panels.title: Top Blocked Domains

panels.description: Total number of zones managed by Technitium (from dashboard stats).
panels.title: Total Managed Zones

panels.description: Number of zones explicitly in allow-list (from dashboard stats).
panels.title: Zones in Allow List

panels.description: Number of zones explicitly marked as blocked in Technitium.
panels.title: Blocked Zones

panels.description: Number of zones coming from imported blocklists.
panels.title: Zones in Block List

panels.description: Number of zones explicitly allowed (whitelisted).
panels.title: Allowed Zones

panels.description: Breakdown of queries in the current stats window by category (no_error, nxdomain, blocked, etc.), plotted over time via Prometheus scraping.
panels.title: Queries by Category (Trend)

panels.description: Cache hit ratio over time, computed from response types (Cached vs Cached+Recursive).
panels.title: Cache hit ratio (trend)

panels.description: Number of unique clients seen per scrape over time (based on stats window snapshot).
panels.title: Clients Over Time

panels.description: Most-queried domains in the current stats window (hits per domain).
panels.title: Top Queried Domains

panels.description: Top clients over time (hits per client from stats window snapshot). Use for spotting noisy clients.
panels.title: Top Clients (Trend)

panels.description: Tabular view of top clients with total hits in the current stats window snapshot.
panels.title: Top Clients

panels.description: Breakdown of DNS query types (A, AAAA, HTTPS, PTR, etc.) over time.
panels.title: Query types (A / AAAA / HTTPS / â€¦)

panels.description: Breakdown of protocol usage for DNS queries (UDP / TCP / DoH / DoT etc depending on Technitium config).
panels.title: Protocols

panels.description: Zones, cache entries, and blocklist zones over time (good for spotting sync/import issues).
panels.title: Zones / cache / blocklists

title: Technitium DNS Prometheus Exporter
